The #1 writing assistant for recruiters
🤝Find candidates, connect faster, get quicker responses, and make more placements!
⚡HOW SOURCD WORKS
Sourcd leverages generative AI to craft personalised candidate outreach emails instantly and at scale. It reviews a candidate's profile with your specific criteria in mind, crafting the ideal personalised email:
1️⃣ View the candidate profile 
Visit a candidate’s profile on LinkedIn 
2️⃣Enter key information
Select language, tone, key skills, and position. Sourcd will use these to craft the outreach email highlighting how they would fit based on their profile. 
3️⃣Send the perfect email
You’re in control! Before sending the email – view, edit, shorten, re-phrase and much more. 
⚡KEY HIGHLIGHTS  
🌍 Choose your language and tone
Choose from a range of 8 distinct languages (English UK or US, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Mandarin, Polish & Spanish) and 5 various tones (Casual, Conversational, Formal, Friendly & Professional).
📄Create personalised templates 
If you have a preference to your introductory and closing messages, with Sourcd you have the option to design your custom template or allow Sourcd to handle the task for you!
📈Enhance your response
Ensure that your message stands out by highlighting the specific text you'd like to refine in the generated response—whether it's to expand, shorten, regenerate, or rephrase. 
🆓 Free to Start! 
Unlock the value with Sourcd’s free trial that provides you full access to our Chrome Extension with 10 free emails per month.
💡Add Sourcd to your browser in seconds and instantly create personalised outreach emails at scale today!
